title: Development of the Myliddy Fishery Harbour - Phase III
decision_details: - Phases I and II of the development of the Myliddy Fishery Harbour, Jaffna have been completed. The remaining development work of the harbour is planned to be implemented under Phase III. Under that phase, it is expected to provide main and essential facilities such as water, electricity, fuel to the fishing community of the Northern Province as well as fishing boats coming from the Eastern and Southern Provinces and to provide essential net mending hall facilities, auction hall facilities and radio transmission facilities (radio rooms) to the fishing community. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Fisheries, Aquatic and Ocean Resources to carry out the land-based constructions planned under Phase III of the development of the Myliddy Fishery Harbour and to extend the project period up to the year 2027, was approved by the Cabinet.
